page.title: 19A LOCAL CUSTOM continued
page.content: After the fire is blazing into the night sky the people who carried the{ {Barls}set off in groups around the village{'First Footing'}and celabrating the New Year. The people who carry the{Barls}must be born in Allendale.There is quite along list of people who want to take part in this unique custom ,but only 40 people are aloud to take part. The {Guysers},as the people who carry the {Barls}are called, dress up in{ {Fancy Dress}when they carry the Barls. The origin of this custom is uncertain but it has definitely been pracised for the last 100 Years. Even the blackouts of the Second World War did not interrupt the ceremony _ the Barls were fitted with covers so that you couldn't see any light. Thousands of people come to see this unusual custom every year.
